title: Rape in India: Why are there no mass protests for raped Dalit women?
content: By Shenali Waduge The question is very simple. While rape in any form is abhorred and should be severely punished by all nations what needs to be answered is what makes the recent gangrape by 6 men of a 23 year old on a bus in Delhi any different from the gangrape of a 16…
